newsitem.title: UK: Bank Austria sets 250 mln mark Eurobond. [CORRECTED 9:27 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Bank Austria sets 250 mln mark Eurobond. [CORRECTED 9:27 GMT]

text.p: The following bond was announced by lead manager SBC Warburg (Frankfurt).
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 101.475 PAY DATE S07.OCT.96
MOODY AAA LISTING LUX PAY FREQ =
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY = TAX PROVS =
(Lead manager corrects fees under "MGT/UND" and "SELL CONC" which were reversed).
UNDERLYING GOVT BOND 5.125 PCT NOV 2000 OBL 117
